title: Activity-Based Health Science Data Analysis: Short-Term Course for Strengthening Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Emphasizes activity-based learning through real-time interaction and formative assessments in smartphone-based limited technological environments. Minimizes lecture-based instruction and prioritizes task-centered learning design

learning_goals: Learners can analyze basic data in health sciences using mathematical methods
Through activity-based learning tasks, learners can apply statistics to real-world work scenarios
Learners can continuously improve data interpretation skills through peer feedback and formative assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
